mapper.insert: insert into memberList (uId, uPw, uName, uPhone, uZip, uAddr1, uAddr2, uEmail, uLevel) values (#{uId}, #{uPw}, #{uName}, #{uPhone}, #{uZip}, #{uAddr1}, #{uAddr2}, #{uEmail}, 1)
mapper.select: select uId, uPw, uName, uEmail from memList where no = #{no}
select * from memList order by no desc
